animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a puddle. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow when I am little.
💧 I love to play in the water.
🗣️ I say 'Quack!'

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase string. I purr when you pet me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with balls of yarn.
🥛 I love to drink milk.
🐈 I have whiskers and a tail.

animal.question: I say 'Woof' and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🎾 I love to chase balls.
🐕 I am a good friend to people.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I never forget. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.
👃 My nose is very long and useful.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. I have long ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat orange vegetables.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🐾 I like to hop and jump.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. I like to chatter. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I love to eat yellow fruit.
🐒 I like to climb.
🗣️ I make a lot of noise.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I'm the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a cat, but a very big one!
🦁 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I hiss and slither. I have no legs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🌿 I live in the grass.
👅 I have a forked tongue.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I look like a horse. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
🐎 My stripes help me hide.
🦓 I am a herbivore, and I eat grass.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. I can camouflage myself. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
🌊 I can change colors to blend in.
🧠 I am very smart.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🥗 I am often in salads.
🌱 I start as a tiny seed.

plant.question: I have a trunk, branches, and leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🪵 You can build a house with my wood.

plant.question: I am a fruit that is red and round. I grow on a tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate one!
🥧 People make pies with me.
⚕️ An 'a day keeps the doctor away!'

plant.question: I am tall and yellow and grow in a field. Farmers like to grow me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I can be popped to make a tasty snack.
🚜 Animals and people eat me!
🥇 I am the color of the sun.

plant.question: I am a flower with a big yellow head. I follow the sun all day long. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My face always turns toward the light.
🪶 Birds and squirrels enjoy my seeds.
☀️ My name means 'sun' and 'flower'!

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful petals. People give me to show their love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 You must handle me with care!
❤️ I am a symbol of love.
🥀 Some say beauty comes from me.

plant.question: I am a long orange root vegetable that rabbits love to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny can't get enough of me!
👓 People say I am good for your eyes.
☀️ I grow underground.

plant.question: I am a type of tree that gives us yummy nuts. Squirrels like to bury my nuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 My nut is hard and round.
🍂 My leaves are pointy!
🌳 You can climb on me!

plant.question: I am a prickly green plant that lives in the desert. I store water inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 Ouch! Don't touch me without gloves!
🏜️ I can survive in hot, dry places.
💧 I store water in my stem.

plant.question: I am a plant that can climb walls and fences. Sometimes, I even have purple flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can wrap around things.
🏡 People grow me for shade or decoration.
💜 My flowers can be quite fragrant.
